Specimen Type: Patient specimen for DNA extraction (e.g., peripheral blood or tissue)
Purpose: To detect genetic mutations associated with hereditary gastrointestinal cancers for clinical diagnosis and management.
Container: Varies according to specimen (e.g., EDTA blood tube or appropriate tissue container)
Equipment: DNA extraction kits, quantification instruments (Qubit/Nanodrop), PCR thermocyclers, next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina MiSeq), bioinformatics analysis software
